name: Protective Channel
text: When you channel energy, Iomedae grants protection against dark forces.
benefit: When you channel positive energy to heal living creatures, you can choose to affect healed creatures with a protection from evil spell (caster level equal to your effective cleric level).
prerequisites_zh: 引导能量7d6，信仰艾奥梅黛。
benefit_zh: 当你引导正能量治疗活物时，你可以选择使受到你的引导能量治疗的生物获得法术防护邪恶的效果（施法者等级等同于你的有效牧师等级）。
